title: Impossible to create a deck with the GUI

comments.body:
Thanks for the report.

The Card Explorer is only used to browse through all cards. After you have created a new duel, there's a "Edit Deck" button on the bottom right of the screen. That will lead to a screen where you can add and remove cards from the deck.

**Status:** Done
